title: how to boot my portable windows 7 virtual hard disk to other computers?

forumNotes.author: moklo
forumNotes.content:
how to boot my portable windows 7 virtual hard disk to other computers, especially if the laptop or desktop is new, meaning, no operating system installed? or only XP?
